kyvi_app.description: Aplicação desktop criada com Kivy, estrutura modular para projetos Python GUI.

app/.main.py:
# Widget principal
from kivy.uix.boxlayout import BoxLayout

class MainWidget(BoxLayout):
    pass

ui/.main.kv:
<MainWidget>:
    orientation: 'vertical'
    Label:
        text: 'Hello Kivy!'
    Button:
        text: 'Clique aqui'

config/.config.py:
# Configurações do app
APP_NAME = 'KyviApp'
DEBUG = True

tests/.test_main.py:
# Teste do widget principal
def test_main_widget():
    from app.main import MainWidget
    widget = MainWidget()
    assert widget is not None

structure.pyproject.toml:
[project]
name = 'kyvi-app'
version = '0.1.0'
description = 'Exemplo de app Kivy'
authors = [ { name = 'Seu Nome', email = 'seu@email.com' } ]
dependencies = [ 'kivy>=2.0.0' ]
requires-python = '>=3.8'
[build-system]
requires = [ 'setuptools>=61.0' ]
build-backend = 'setuptools.build_meta'
structure.README.md:
# Kyvi App

Estrutura modular para projetos Kivy.
